title: Trust in the Lord
speaker: Matt McCullough
blurb: Everybody wants to live a life that’s long, peaceful, and loved well by others. Proverbs tells us wisdom—a skill or instinct for living life well—is the key. And Proverbs 3 shows us where all true wisdom begins. It begins with a trust in the Lord that leans on him with everything you have and looks for him in everything you face.
